channel.title: Looking for people to help create our rsps!
channel.description:
Hello, Our server is a 317- with added sprites, and new items, I am currently codeing many more great things into our rsps, I would like to offer you a spot on our team, if Helpin Develop this with us ingame you will be an admin, we look forward to your reply. -Tony&George
Name: ChizzleScape
Things to do : Code the server Get a website created get a forum / webclient and ingame development
Staff needed -- 7 Website Developers [0/2] Server Developers [1/2] Graphics designers [0/1] Advertiser [0/1] etc videos, sites Bug/Glitch Testers [1/3]
Hybridpvp based

item.title: Looking for people to help create our rsps!

[/quote]
What the hell did you just say?

Ty for the sig[/quote]

Whats so unclear?

item.title: Looking for people to help create our rsps!
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

You could increase the size of this thread with some media, goals etc., otherwise, I doubt someone is going to bother.

You need some more infomation…
Like… Is your server 317? What is your base? What is your server name? What are your goals? Show us what the sever is right now? Work on these things buddy or no-one will join.
